titleStmt.title: A modest meane to mariage, pleasauntly set foorth by that famous clarke Erasmus Roterodamus, and translated into Englishe by N.L. Anno. 1568
Colloquia. English. Selections
titleStmt.author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
Leigh, Nicholas.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henrie Denham, dwelling in Pater noster Rowe, at the signe of the Starre,

notesStmt.note: A translation of "Procus et puella" and "Adolescens et scortum" from: Colloquia.
Running title reads: Two pleasaunt dialogues.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
